com.google.android.filament

类 Stream.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.filament.Stream.Builder
  • 封闭类:
    Stream

    public static class Stream.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Use Builder to construct an Stream object instance. By default, Stream objects are ACQUIRED and must have external images pushed to them via Stream.setAcquiredImage(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object, java.lang.Runnable). To create a NATIVE stream, call the 
    stream
    method on the builder.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Builder()
      Use Builder to construct an Stream object instance.

    • 方法概要

      Creates a new Stream object instance.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Builder

        public Builder()
        Use Builder to construct an Stream object instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • stream

        public Stream.Builder stream(java.lang.Object streamSource)
        Creates a NATIVE stream. Native streams can sample data directly from an opaque platform object such as a SurfaceTexture on Android.
        参数:
        streamSource - an opaque native stream handle, e.g.: on Android this must be a SurfaceTexture object
        返回:
        This Builder, for chaining calls.
        另请参阅:
        Texture.setExternalStream(com.google.android.filament.Engine, com.google.android.filament.Stream)

      • width

        public Stream.Builder width(int width)
        参数:
        width - initial width of the incoming stream. Whether this value is used is stream dependent. On Android, it must be set when using #stream(long)
        返回:
        This Builder, for chaining calls.

      • height

        public Stream.Builder height(int height)
        参数:
        height - initial height of the incoming stream. Whether this value is used is stream dependent. On Android, it must be set when using #stream(long)
        返回:
        This Builder, for chaining calls.

      • build

        public Stream build(Engine engine)
        Creates a new Stream object instance.
        参数:
        engine - Engine instance to associate this Stream with.
        返回:
        newly created Stream object
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the Stream couldn't be created
